name: Gargoyle Runner
description:
No, you're an oxymoron!

Hit space to jump!
Refresh page if it breaks, which.. it does.

Development

Built this whole Bombay Bad Boy from scratch. Never made an infinite runner before, and it was a good excuse to brush up on my ES6 and programming principles such as currying. Oh, and procedural generation!

It doesn't really work, I mean.. you can't collect the stars and if things get a bit choppy, you'll straight up fall through the floor but you know, I had fun and I'm done with it. Must admit I'm dead proud of my little hand-drawn sprite.
